subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{zh-l|*利|benefit; profit}}, used as a euphemism for {{zh-l|舌|sit6|tongue}}, which is homophonous to {{zh-l|*折}}, {{zh-l|蝕|sit6|to be at a loss}}.

Alternatively, it may be from {{och-l|舐|to lick}}, preserving the Old Chinese initial ''*l-'' ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

}}
